ui.description: Understand how you communicate with others
ui.recommendTitle: π’¬ λ” λ‚μ€ μ†ν†µμ„ μ„ν• ν

items.text: I tend to lead discussions and suggest directions in meetings
I speak in a way that makes others feel comfortable
I explain things with logical reasoning and data
I communicate main points concisely and clearly
I use gestures and facial expressions abundantly
I listen carefully until others finish speaking
I enjoy debates and persuade with logic
I express things indirectly rather than confronting directly
I use humor to create a relaxed atmosphere
